old:
葉脈の侵食は想定を遥かに超えて進んでおり、用意
していた原始の雫では足りないことが判明。原始の雫
の入手が難しいことから、万事休すと思われたが、状
況に対処する精神を手に入れたセシリーたちは、さら
なる原始の雫の入手に故郷の未来を賭けることにした

　関係者が努力、尽力した結果、原始の雫は集まった
が、またロイグが現れた。実際に戦ったものの話によ
ると、ロイグは黒騎士に意識を乗っ取られた状態で、
まるで捨て駒のように使われたそうだ

　思えば哀れな男だ。せめてわたしだけでも、彼の心
情に寄り添ってやろうと思う

　さて、こうして“芯なる樹”の治療は開始されたわ
けだが、精霊竜の治療は、悲しいかな、間に合わなか
ったようだ。これにより覚者たちは重い責務を背負う
ことになった。こればかりは代わってやることもでき
ないし、ねぎらいの言葉も空々しく聞こえることだろ
う
new:
The corruption has spread far beyond expectations, and it has been revealed that the available Primeval Drops were not sufficient. Due to the difficulty in obtaining more Primeval Drops, it seemed like all hope was lost. However, Cecily and her companions, who possess the determination to confront the situation, decided to stake the future of their homeland on acquiring additional Primeval Drops.

Thanks to the efforts and dedication of those involved, the Primeval Drops were successfully gathered. However, Loeg appeared once again. According to accounts of those who actually engaged in battle, Loeg was in a state of being controlled by the Black Knight, used like a disposable pawn.

He truly is a pitiful man. I vow to at least empathize with his emotions.

And so, the treatment of the "Core Tree" has begun. Unfortunately, the treatment of the Spirit Dragon, to our great sorrow, did not finish in time. This places a heavy burden on the Arisen. There is no way to substitute or ease this responsibility, and words of encouragement can only sound empty.
